keywords.name: Cycle
keywords.description: Discard a card and draw a new card to replace it.

keywords.name: Divine
keywords.description: [theDragonkin:LightIcon] Block is Used before other block types and is not lost at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Exalt
keywords.description: Spend X Holy Power for an effect

keywords.name: Fire
keywords.description: Fire damage applies Scorch equal to half of unblocked damage dealt.

keywords.name: Holy
keywords.description: Energy spent on Holy cards is accumulated to produce Holy Power which increases the damage and block gain of Holy cards for the rest of combat.

keywords.name: Holy Power
keywords.description: Increases damage and Block gain of Holy cards.

keywords.name: Penance
keywords.description: When a creature obtains 8 Penance, it loses 20 HP and HP loss from this effect is increased by 10 this combat

keywords.name: Primal
keywords.description: Energy spent on Primal cards applies Scorch to random enemies.

keywords.name: Sacrifice
keywords.description: When you obtain 5 Sacrifice spend it and gain 1 Holy Power.

keywords.name: Sanctify
keywords.description:
Discard X cards, Gain the following effect if you Discard a Holy card.
Primal, Status and Curse cards discarded become Divine Embers

keywords.name: Scorch
keywords.description: Scorched creatures take damage equal to their scorch and lose 25% of their scorch when Attacked

keywords.name: Sealed
keywords.description: Sealed effects activate whenever you discard a Status or Primal card.

keywords.name: Tribute
keywords.description:
Perform the following effect every X damage taken or HP lost.
At the end of your turn, if you took no damage or HP loss this turn take X damage and remove this effect.
